name: Communication Delay
description:
You control a military drone and try to survive amidst other hostiles, but your drone is far away and takes is almost uncontrollable with a lot of latency between instruction and action. Use your limited arsenal to kill as many enemy drones as you can before too many of them spawn. How long can you survive?

Source available at: https://github.com/BenRCook/Communication-Delay
